user: I'm going to the bank. What do you need to do?
bot: What do you need to do?

user: I need to withdraw some money.
bot: How are you going to do that?

user: I'll just use the ATM.
bot: What's that?

user: It's the automatic teller machine.
bot: It gives you money?

user: I just insert my debit card into the machine.
bot: And it gives you money?

user: Well, it gives me money, but it's my own money.
bot: Oh. What good is that? I thought it gave you free money.

user: Did you put the blue bin out on the street?
bot: Oh, no. I forgot.

user: Well, you'd better take it out front.
bot: What time does the recycle truck come by?

user: It usually gets here at noon on Tuesday, which is tomorrow.
bot: I'll just take it out to the street tomorrow morning.

user: Oh, no, you don't.
bot: What do you mean?

user: Every morning you get up late and rush off to work late.
bot: Do you think I'll forget to do it?

user: You'll remember to do it, but you won't have time to do it.
bot: Okay, I'll take it out front right now.

user: Are you ready?
bot: Ready for what?

user: The big switch.
bot: What are you talking about?

user: The nation is switching to digital TV.
bot: Oh. Of course, I'm ready.

user: Did you buy the converter?
bot: No, I don't need a converter because I bought a digital TV.

user: How much was that?
bot: It was only about $120 for a 13-inch screen.

user: Does it pick up any digital channels?
bot: Oh, yes. I get six Korean channels but nothing in English!

user: People are funny.
bot: They sure are.

user: Did you hear about the pilot?
bot: The one that stole a small plane?

user: Yes, he stole a plane in Canada and flew into the U.S.
bot: Did they catch him?

user: Yes. After two U.S. fighter jets followed him for an hour, he landed on a highway.
bot: Did he crash?

user: No, he just landed the plane and walked to a restaurant.
bot: Did the cops find out why he flew into the U.S.?

user: His life sucked. He was hoping a fighter jet would shoot him down.
bot: Poor guy.

user: The police need our help finding a robber.
bot: How do you know?

user: The TV news is reporting a bank robbery.
bot: Do they know what the robber looks like?

user: Yes, he's 6 feet tall, 200 pounds, black hair, and about 30 years old.
bot: What race is he?

user: They didn't say.
bot: The TV news doesn't tell us the race anymore.

user: Of course not. That would be racist.
bot: But how can we identify someone if we don't know their race?

user: Don't ask me.
bot: Then they also shouldn't tell us if the robber is male or female, because that is sexist.

user: Don't wipe your nose on your sleeve.
bot: But I don't have a tissue.

user: Then go find a tissue in the bathroom.
bot: I didn't have time to get one from there.

user: Your sleeves are not tissues.
bot: But mom, all my friends use their sleeves.

user: That doesn't make it right.
bot: I saw Dad wipe his nose on his sleeve yesterday.

user: I will talk to your father about that.
bot: I bet Dad did it all the time when he was my age.

user: Your daddy was a good little boy.
bot: How do you know? Were you his mommy, too?

user: I'm worried.
bot: Worried about what?

bot: You should be happy, not worried.

user: Yes, I am happy, but marriage is a lot of responsibility.
bot: Yes, you have to take care of your wife.

user: And I have to take care of our children.
bot: Are you going to start a family?

user: Yes. We want to have a little boy and a little girl.
bot: That sounds wonderful.

user: Except we can't afford it!
bot: No wonder you're worried.

user: I don't get art.
bot: Or artists.

user: They're in a different world.
bot: I saw a painting of a jar that was full of pencils.

user: The artist said the jar was both full and empty.
bot: But it was full of pencils! How could he say it was empty?

user: Artists see things differently.
bot: Did you ever see anything that Picasso painted?

user: Of course! He's world-famous.
bot: Did he ever take art lessons?

user: I can't believe it. I drew paintings like that in third grade.
bot: Where are they? Maybe they are worth millions.

user: What's the point?
bot: The point of what?

user: Of living.
bot: Who knows? You live, and then you die.

user: We must be here for some reason.
bot: Maybe we're here to have fun.

user: Then why aren't I having fun?
bot: Because you're thinking too much.

user: So I should stop thinking?
bot: Stop thinking about what the point is.

user: Okay. I'll go have fun.
bot: That's the spirit!
